name: 8.0.0-M1
description: Major release (API break, new additions) Milestone 1

issues.title: AjaxButton - image is not shown even though type="image" is in html-template
Mounted TemplateResourceReference throws  org.apache.wicket.WicketRuntimeException when https is used
"Range" header parsing is broken
Mounted packages throw IllegalArgumentException when visiting base package url.
Compatibility problem with Websphere liberty profile
AjaxFormValidatingBehavior not updates initially hidden feedback component
Exception raised while refreshing a page with queued components missing in the markup
FileUploadField makes form-component models become null on submit
WicketRuntimeException from AjaxPagingNavigator#onAjaxEvent
ModalWindow.closeCurrent() causes 414 status error
PageableListView constructor argument and set/getItemsPerPage are inconsistent
Downloading filenames containing ',' or ';' gives problems
NPE in case DebugBar is added to AjaxRequestTarget
CLONE - AjaxFallbackOrderByBorder wicketOrder[Up|Down|None] class missing in 7.1.0
TransparentWebMarkupContainer breaks OnChangeAjaxBehavior for Select2
Tests fail when executed with not expected locale
TransparentWebMarkupContainer is not really "transparent"
GuiceFieldValueFactory returns the NULL_SENTINEL from the cache
ConcurrentModificationException in MarkupContainer#iterator#next
Possible issue with Border and LoadableDetachableModel in 7.1.0
Problem in detecting child id on nested <wicket:enclosure>
Nested TransparentWebMarkupContainer, markup of inner component not found
Detach called on enclosure component while it had a non-empty queue
NPE in PackageResourceReference#getResource() when there is no request
Wicket.Ajax.done() called twice on redirect
Failure to process markup with nested tags inside a Label
ModalWindow vulnerable to Javascript injection through title model
Cannot set wicket:enclosure on queued component in ListView
AjaxFormChoiceComponentUpdatingBehavior: Duplicate input values according to WICKET-5948
ListView NullPointerException when viewSize is set explicitly
German Translation for EqualInputValidator wrong
Wicket Ajax (Wicket.From.serializeElement) causes 400 bad request
CSS header contribution overlap
Error in calculation of byte ranges
TransparentWebMarkupContainer can not resolve autocomponents in its parent
MockHttpSession should renew its id after invalidation
Add support for WebSocketRequest#getUrl() and other properties which are available in the handshake request
WebSocketResponse.sendRedirect could be supported with <ajax-response><redirect>...</></>
Calling http://examples7x.wicket.apache.org/resourceaggregation/ generate Internal error
The key RangeValidator.exact is not mapped in Application_de.properties
OnChangeAjaxBehavior does not work if the url contains a request parameter with same name as wicket id
Problem with queued components and enclosure
Problem with queued components and auto linking
Problem with queued components and label
Encapsulation of 3 enclosures leads to WicketRuntimeException
ajax request failure handler receives incorrect arguments
AjaxTimerBehavior with failure handler cause memory leak in browser
Invalid AbstractRequestWrapperFactory.needsWrapper method scope: package - cannot create a custom implementation
Problem with queued components and setting the model
NPE in RequestLoggerRequestCycleListener when using native-websockets
Find adequate ResourceReference with mount parameters
JsonRequestLogger --> JsonMappingException --> StackOverflowError Infinite recursion
StackoverflowError related to enclosures
Closing a ModalWindow with jQuery 2.2.0 produces javascript errors
Enclosure - "IllegalArgumentException: Argument 'markup' may not be null" after app restart
Empty redirect on redirect to home page if home page already shown
Exception 'A child already exists' when backing to a page with some markups in a Border
IRequestCycleListener not notified of all executed handlers
IndexOutOfBoundsException in org.apache.wicket.core.request.mapper.CryptoMapper.decryptEntireUrl
Failing test SpringBeanWithGenericsTest in 7.3.0.0 SNAPSHOT
NPE when using ListView with missing markup
There is no good way to get POST body content
AjaxButton forces rendering type="button"
Runtime Exception rendering ComponentTag with RelativePathPrefixHandler
DebugBar/PageSizeDebugPanel throws NullPointerException (need wrapper exception with more detail)
Performance bottleneck when using KeyInSessionSunJceCryptFactory
Newline in ModalWindow title
WicketTester and application servers are destroying app differently
Missing type for MediaComponent causing iOS devices not to be able to play videos
Reload leads to unexpected RuntimeException 'Unable to find component with id'
NullPointerException accessing AbstractRequestLogger.getLiveSessions
Wrong requestmapper used for cache decorated resources
Problem with nested dialog with multipart form
Inconsistent results from getTag[s]ByWicketId
WICKET-6172 makes TagTester.createTagsByAttribute stop working
Browser/Client info navigatorJavaEnabled property returns undefined
Aautocomplete suggestion window is not closing in IE11
JMX Initializer's usage of CGLIB makes it impossible to upgrade to CGLIB 3.2.3
Border body not reachable for visitors
Enclosures rendered twice in derived component
AjaxTimerBehavior will stop after ajax update of component it is attached to
Autocomplete has a bug
Introduce models which use Java 8 supplier/consumer
Read resource files with Java's NIO API
Implementation of ExternalImage component
Wicket Metrics
use lambdas for columns
NestedStringResourceLoader - replaces nested keys within property files
Model and GenericBaseModel could both implement IObjectClassAwareModel
Please give us access to PageTable.index pageId queue
NumberTextField<N> should use Models for minimum, maximum and step
AjaxFallbackOrderByBorder/Link should support updateAjaxAttributes() idiom
Remove 'final' modifier for Localizer#getStringIgnoreSettings() methods
small tweak for component queuing for the AbstractRepeater
Make Border's methods consistent with commit f14e03f
Wicket Quickstart Example Application shows deployment memory leak in Tomcat
Improve performance of CssUrlReplacer
Allow to reuse the same application instance in several tests
Provide a factory method for the WebSocketResponse & WebSocketRequest
Deprecate org.apache.wicket.util.IProvider
Improved PackageResource#getCacheKey
Provide factory methods for WizardButtonBar buttons
Improve the quickstart to make it easier to use JSR-356 web sockets
Add "assertNotRequired" to the WicketTester
Add logging to HttpSessionDataStore
Upgrade jQuery to 1.12.3/2.2.3
Synchronization on JSR 356 connection
Rework AjaxFallback** components to use java.util.Optional for their #onEvent methods
Propagate JSR 356 WebSocket connection error to a page
Broadcast onClose event regardless of the JSR 356 WebSocket connection closed state
Add a message to StalePageException for better debugging
Improve ResourceStreamResource API by passing Attributes to #getResourceStream()
FormComponentPanel#clearInput() should delegate to its FormComponent children
Provide default implementation of IDetachable#detach() in IModel
Make IGenericComponent a mixin/trait so it could be easily reused in custom components
Deprecate org.apache.wicket.util.IContextProvider
Add .map to the list of allowed file extensions in SecurePackageResourceGuard
Remove 'abstract' from ChainingModel
Add metrics for request duration
Add metrics for currently active sessions
Make it easier to override parts of SystemMapper
AbstractChoice#getChoices() should be final
ListenerInterfaceRequestHandler simplification
Ajax should prevent updating components which are not on page
Wicket-ajax parameter / header may be used to bypass proper exception handling
Enable DeltaManager to replicate PageTable in Sessions
Provide default implementation of IRequestHandler#detach()
Allow to add more than one WebSocketBehavior in the component tree
WicketTester's MockHttpServletRequest doesn't expose setLocale(aLocale) method
MetaDataHeaderItem # generateString() should return specials characters escaped like StringEscapeUtils.escapeHtml(s) does
Remove recreateBookmarkablePagesAfterExpiry check in Component#createRequestHandler
Improve stateless support for AJAX
Remove form argument from AjaxButton and AjaxSubmitLink callbacks
Use DynamicJQueryResourceReference by default
Return Optional<T> from RequestCycle.find(Class<T>)
Provide an Ajax Behavior that prevents form submit on ENTER
Multiline headers in DataTable
Upgrade Jetty usage in Wicket tests/quickstart to Jetty 9.3.x
Wicket 8 cleanup - TODOs and deprecated methods
Upgrade commons-collections to 4.1
Upgrade jQuery to 1.12 / 2.2.0
Deprecate HtmlDocumentValidator
Remove the support for the deprecated /wicket.properties and /META-INF/wicket/**.properties
Deprecate org.apache.wicket.util.crypt.Base64 and use java.util.Base64
